overview: Enya: The Video Collection is a visual anthology of Celtic new age recording artist Enya. This collection contains 13 promotional music videos highlighting her career from her self-titled debut in 1987 to her 2000 album, A Day Without Rain. Includes the tracks "Book of Days," "On My Way Home," and "Orinoco Flow." Also contains a biographical documentary called "Enya: A Life in Music," along with behind-the-scenes footage from the "Caribbean Blue" and "Only Time" videos.
title: Enya: The Video Collection
